name: Space Time (LukeGLi)
description:
Become Large Antimatter!!!

WASD and arrow keys to move

Space to dash

Esc to exit application (Play in full screen! Some text is janky in minimized)

Title screen not working in WebGL version (minimized), just press any key to start.

 (Did not have time to engineer audio, sorry)

(I am aware that this is not how antimatter and matter interact, I did not have time to flesh out any type of story to explain that inconsistency)
